sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is to update the field type of ais_search_profile column in sys_search_event_table to a reference field in ais_search_profile</description>
        <name>Update AIS Search Profile Field Type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "sys_search_event");
    gr.addQuery("element=ais_profile");
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "reference");
        gr.setValue("reference", "ais_search_profile");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-11-20 00:07:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>16c133c25b2020105b1eed35cc81c7dc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update AIS Search Profile Field Type</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Text Search Analytics" source="com.glide.search.analytics">2d3878203cf1311068bcf327dfe37fd5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_16c133c25b2020105b1eed35cc81c7dc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-11-20 00:07:22</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update AIS Search Profile Field Type
